name: Jeeps Offroad Simulator
description:
Have you ever had the opportunity to participate in a real offroad?

With a proper car, equipped with 4x4 and good tyres, no hill can't stop you.
But it's not quite like that.... However,the jeep makes only 50% of the success. No one has yet overturned the professionalism. Your mission is to demonstrate how good a driver you are in offroad conditions having a time limit for each challenge.

This racing game challenges you to combine both to conquer the steepest valleys and the highest hills. Show everyone that you have no fear!

Game features :
- 10 missions
- 4 off-road equipped jeeps
- Time limit for each challenge
